Package org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.autos.commands

Class AutonomousCommands

java.lang.Object
com.arcrobotics.ftclib.command.CommandBase
com.arcrobotics.ftclib.command.CommandGroupBase
com.arcrobotics.ftclib.command.SequentialCommandGroup
org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.autos.commands.AutonomousCommands
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.arcrobotics.ftclib.command.Command
public class AutonomousCommands extends com.arcrobotics.ftclib.command.SequentialCommandGroup
A complex autonomous command sequence for a full autonomous period. This SequentialCommandGroup orchestrates a series of actions including driving, shooting, and intaking to score points during the autonomous phase of an FTC match.

The sequence is as follows:

  1. Set the robot's starting position.
  2. Spin up the shooter to the correct speed (long or short shot).
  3. Drive to the first shooting position.
  4. Shoot three times.
  5. Drive to the first intake line position, wait briefly, and then drive to catch the pixels.
  6. Drive to the second shooting position, spin up the shooter, and shoot three times.
  7. Drive to the second intake line position, wait, and catch pixels.
  8. Drive to the third shooting position, spin up the shooter, and shoot three times.
  9. Drive to the third intake line position, wait, and catch pixels.
  10. Drive to the fourth shooting position, spin up the shooter (opposite distance of the first shot).
  11. Drive back to the first shooting position and shoot a final three times.

This command group requires the DrivetrainSubsystem, ShooterSubsystem, and IntakeSubsystem.

  • Constructor Details

    • AutonomousCommands

      public AutonomousCommands (@NonNull DrivetrainSubsystem drivetrain, ShooterSubsystem shooter, IntakeSubsystem intake, List<com.pedropathing.geometry.Pose> poses, boolean LongFisrt)
      Creates a new autonomous command sequence. This sequence orchestrates the robot's actions during the autonomous period, including driving to specified poses, shooting rings, and intaking rings. The specific path and shooting distances are determined by the provided poses and the 'LongFirst' flag.
      Parameters:
      drivetrain - The drivetrain subsystem for robot movement.
      shooter - The shooter subsystem for launching rings.
      intake - The intake subsystem for collecting rings.
      poses - A list of Pose objects defining the robot's path and key locations. The order and meaning of these poses are defined by the PosesNames enum.
      LongFisrt - A boolean flag to determine the initial shooting distance. If true, the first shot is a long shot; otherwise, it's a short shot.
